content: अंडः --डं [अमंति संप्रयोगं यांति अनेन; अम्-ड <ls>Uṇ. 1. 111</ls>] {@--1@} The testicles. {@--2@} The scrotum. {@--3@} An egg; <ab>oft.</ab> used with reference to the world as having sprung from the primordial egg of Brahmā; ब्रह्मांडच्छत्रंदडः <ls>Dk. 1.</ls> {@--4@} The musk bag. {@--5@} Semen virile. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva.

अंडः --डं [अमंति संप्रयोगं यांति अनेन; अम्-ड <ls>Uṇ. 1. 111</ls>] {@--1@} The testicles. {@--2@} The scrotum. {@--3@} An egg; <ab>oft.</ab> used with reference to the world as having sprung from the primordial egg of Brahmā; ब्रह्मांडच्छत्रंदडः <ls>Dk. 1.</ls> {@--4@} The musk bag. {@--5@} Semen virile. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva.
